events.name: YCS Presents: Tech Gala
events.description: Come to the 1st annual Tech Gala, an end-of-year celebration of computer science at Yale!

events.name: Facebook CodeLab
events.description: Interview workshop hosted by Yale alumni now working as Facebook engineers!

events.name: Hacknights Week 02
events.description: Come to Hacknights Week 02! Food/drinks provided.

events.name: Daniel Friedman
events.description: Thiel Fellow, Forbes 30 Under 30 Social Innovator, and CEO of Thinkful, an online coding bootcamp that combines face-to-face learning with the accessibility of online education.

events.name: Hacknights Week 01
events.description: Come to Hacknights Week 01! Food/drinks provided.

events.name: Yusuf Simonson
events.description: CTO at TheMuse (YCombinator W12), online jobs and career advice platform w/ 50M users and $28M in funding.

events.name: Hacknights Week 00
events.description: Join YCS for our inaugural Hack Nights! Code together with your friends on psets, projects, etc. while enjoying free food and drinks.

events.name: CS 477 Study Session
events.description: Study for the upcoming NLP midterm together!

events.name: CS 365 Study Session
events.description: Study for the upcoming CPSC 365 midterm with friends and Insomnia cookies!

events.name: YCS Grace Hopper Prize Info Session
events.description: Come to the first info session for the Grace Hopper Prize and the Alan Perlis Prize for Newcomers

events.name: Study sessions for finals
events.description: Come study with friends at the CEID. Check out our events on Facebook to find the times for you class. Lots of cookies await for you.

events.name: Interview Workshop I
events.description: Learn about the process of interviewing for the main tech companies, the coding challenges and how to prepare for them. Dinner (pizza & cookies) will be provided.

events.name: Julia Austin
events.description: CTO at DigitalOcean and Senior Lecturer at Harvard Business School. Previously at VMWare and Akamai.

events.description: CEO & Co-founder of Genius, formerly Rap Genius, the worldâ€™s biggest collection of song lyrics and crowdsourced musical knowledge.
